messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I need a break. How far are we from Christmas Day?

I found that Christmas Day has a timestamp of 1766638800.0. To calculate how far we are from Christmas Day, I need to know the current date and time. Could you please tell me what the current date and time is? I'll then be able to calculate exactly how many days and hours remain until Christmas!
I don't have the current date and time info.

I understand! Unfortunately, I don't have access to a function that can get the current date and time automatically. To calculate how far we are from Christmas Day, I would need to know the current date and time so I can compare it with Christmas Day.

If you'd like to know the exact time remaining until Christmas, you could provide me with today's date and current time, and I'll be happy to calculate the difference for you!

Alternatively, you can check the current date on your device and I can help with the calculation from there.

You're welcome! Feel free to come back anytime if you'd like to calculate the time remaining until Christmas (or any other date calculations) - just provide the current date and time and I'll be happy to help figure out exactly how much time is left until your break! ðŸŽ„
